text: Aleksander Melgalvis Andreassen (born 10 August 1989) is a Norwegian footballer who plays for Lillestrøm. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Eliteserien players Category:Norwegian First Division players Category:Kongsvinger IL Toppfotball players Category:Strømmen IF players Category:Lillestrøm SK players Category:Association football defenders Category:Sportspeople from Hamar
title: Aleksander Melgalvis Andreassen
